Reviews.Title: Major Upgrade
Reviews.Author: JustMyExperience
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Zmodo 8 ch DVR/camera kit awhile back. The cameras that came with it were terrible to say the least. I wanted to see what else I could get. I purchased one of these to see how it compared. I figured out that I wanted something 700TVL, Dome, White, Wide-Angle, Day/Night. Looking at prices/reviews it didn't take long for me to find this one.-This has the best resolution you can get without going to IP cameras (which my system isn't set up for).-The camera itself was easy to install.-The difference in image quality (both day and night) between these and the 480tvl bullet cams I had, is amazing. Color and resolution. From across the room, looking at the monitor for my DVR, you can tell which channel the new camera is on.-It's white and a dome, it blends into my soffit much better than the black bullet cams that came with my kit.-No problems so far with any of them, they all worked right out of the box.-Wish it came with a power supply plug, seems these are usually sold separate though.Basically, this was a major upgrade from what I had and I will buy enough for the rest of my DVR channels in the near future, as budget allows.

Reviews.Title: amazing upgrade
Reviews.Author: BillyETX
Reviews.Content: This being my first 700 TVL camera to purchase I can't judge the quality much To other 700 tvl except comparing it to my stock zmodo bullet (Supposed 480tvl) cameras. Between the two is like trying to look through wax paper and then glass... The quality is far superior, ir-cut filter gives true colors and the night vision is amazing even in places where there isn't any light. I wish I had a picture to prove it, I'm so impressed I'm upgrading all my cameras with this.Also I like the all metal housing a lot. Evertech has my business!

Reviews.Title: great buy..
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: A very clear picture with good color, and gives a 80 degree wide angle view, great to put under your home overhangs, about 40 ft. at night with IR on.a great buy for the money..

Reviews.Title: This is the CCTV camera to buy!
Reviews.Author: Ian Cole
Reviews.Content: I will keep this brief - I bought a Swann SWDVK-425504 4-Channel DVR Kit and have been generally very pleased with it. The stock Swann PRO-530 cameras are adequate to good quality - however, I wanted to see if image quality could be stepped up. This camera is a noticeable improvement in both day and night quality, more accurate color reproduction, and a slightly wider field of view, which is generally desirable. I don't think consumer-grade CCTV can be much improved beyond this camera at present- $51 for a state of the art is huge value. I will be switching the rest of my PRO-530s for this model.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality Image and housing construction
Reviews.Author: AmazonConsumer10000
Reviews.Content: Have this Evertech camera up and running for 9 days now.  The image quality is clear, and faces are identifiable with camera up to about 25 feet. A setup height of 6' above ground level helps, especially if the person(s) are wearing baseball caps, very unlikely they will have a chance to hide their faces by the time they see the camera. I would purchase this camera again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value with great picture resolution
Reviews.Author: Spiderman
Reviews.Content: Camera 700 TVL excellent product - equal quality color picture Lorex 16 channel CCTV  system I purchased, with same connections works perfect.Problem with most CCTV camera systems I've seen, even professionally installed, trying to figure out facial recognition or license plates when the cameras are always positioned up high pointing downward.  I wanted this camera to be mounted same height  as my door bell getting a direct view of the face or license plate.  Camera is made of metal, can easily be painted with latex house paint not making it so noticeable.Lens is held on by bottom ring that unscrews left to right, remove ball lens, mount base held on with screws, position camera ball  as needed, tighten ring will secure camera.  If you plan to mount in an area that has a porch light or some sort of landscape illumination, works perfect. Most night vision cameras are black and white with limit viability but in complete darkness, this camera viewing is good. Tape or use shrink tubing on connections to assure they won't come undone, I use a T25 Arrow Stapler Amazon sells for $30, with 9/16 staples.  Wire not long enough? Purchase  BNC Female to Female Coupler Adapters Pack of 10 - $4 allowing additional wires to be connected with no loss of signal or camera quality. CCTV wire 65' - $6.  Need longer runs, VideoSecu 150 Feet Wire $14 excellent wire.  Wire can be painted with latex house paint for better installation look.  My neighbor thinks I'm paranoid but I installed a camera about 3 feet off the ground in my landscape area near sidewalk pointing in the direction of vehicle travel so I can have a direct view of vehicles pulling into my property or driving past able to see perfectly license plates.  Next time my Christmas UPS packages are stolen, I'll have video to see who the creep was.For $38, the camera works perfect, I purchased two more.  Only CON would be the ring that held the lens on was very difficult to unscrew from the factory.  I  had to use a pipe wrench and place in vise to get it unscrewed.  I did scratch the finish but I planned on painting the camera same color as my house.  Two other cameras I purchased did not have this issue and unscrewed perfectly.Consider mounting this camera at face level and this is the perfect camera to buy.  Criminals when they see these cameras mounted up high only need to wear a baseball cap, look downward and the camera will never capture the creeps face.You won't be unhappy and if you are for some reason, Amazon makes it very easy to return.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Animalover
Reviews.Content: Item function as described, clear image qualities, easy to install and very affordable. Hope they will last for a long time. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: reasonably priced and works well
Reviews.Author: Desert Creatures
Reviews.Content: This camera has a pretty wide field of view, approximately 90 degrees. The IR illuminators are good and don't wash out the picture at close range. Installation is simple. The camera has two typical hookups, the coax and power cable. This unit does NOT come with the power supply, But you can pick those up for a few dollars on Amazon too. I would say this camera works just as good as more expensive models made by other companies.

Reviews.Title: Bulky and not a very good zoom
Reviews.Author: Rbaum
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this camera...The zoom and focus are manual and a pain to dial in and the camera is too bulky to mount anywhere

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Fast and GREAT Service, Product was outstanding with CLEAR night IR viewing. I ordered two of this camera for replacing older models and will be ordering more soon for half the cost and sharper images.

Reviews.Title: Evertech Cctv Security Camera - 700 TVL
Reviews.Author: JacobHopkins117
Reviews.Content: It looks like I may have received a defective unit. The picture is fine during the day; however, once the IR LEDs came on at night, the image totally washed out. What was even more odd, I could actually see a reflection of the camera itself in the image.  I have another Evertech camera model EV-CDM368IR v.7-W), it has 36 IR LEDs. I was very pleased with this camera so I decided to go with Evertech again, except for the cheaper model with fewer IR LEDs. I will be returning this one and buying the same model as my other. See my customer images for more details.

Reviews.Title: its ok for the price but it could have been better idk what people talking about in these good reviews
Reviews.Author: Zaki
Reviews.Content: I'm giving it 2 stars because of better night vision and a true wide angle but the quality of image and facial recognition sucks compare to my old 420 tvl night owl cameras. I was really hoping that 700tvl would allow me to have better facial recognition but that wasn't true. NOTE: Cameras are good for outdoor purpose to keep an eye out for any activity but indoor quality can really use lots of improvement. I wouldn't purchase another one sorry.

Reviews.Title: Pretty decent for the price
Reviews.Author: Vegas052
Reviews.Content: excellent colors and graphic i don't see any bad side on the camera yet for the money is great i will buy another camera for my new 8 channels dvr

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERAS, CLEAR PICTURE
Reviews.Author: D. R. Hamilton
Reviews.Content: YOU COULD SEE MORE DETAILED PICTURES, GREAT NIGHT VISION. I BOUGHT ONE FOR FRONT PORCH AND ONE FOR MY BACK PORCH........

Reviews.Title: Great camera but a little difficult to install
Reviews.Author: Robert Cookson
Reviews.Content: Great camera for my needs. Love the 700 TVL's but if you have no patience at all, have someone else install it.Like the infrared to 60-65 feet versus 30 feet.

Reviews.Title: night vision Suks
Reviews.Author: marco
Reviews.Content: great for day night vision needs alot of attention unless u have light around. i would still buy it again. in fact i bought two

Reviews.Title: Nice camera but
Reviews.Author: Techpro
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, good night vision.  700TVL is questionable.  I replaced a 480TVL camera after 1 year with failed LEDs.  The picture quality doesn't appear any better.  The Sony sensors are definitely superior to the no name brand.Update:  I've had this camera installed in the garage for 4 months and the LEDs have stopped working.  I still get a video signal (somewhat degraded then when installed), but no night vision illumination.  Not having good luck keeping LEDs working.  This is the third camera with failed LEDs.  All are different brands.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera - Great Price
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This is a good little camera, I thought it was super easy to install (I read another review on here that said it was difficult, so I was a bit worried) and the picture is really good.  I think the night vision is a bit narrow, so for night time viewing they are not good for wide area coverage.I ordered 2 and after having them in for a few days I just ordered 2 more for other areas.  They are not the cameras I would choose to cover a large area (driveway or entire yard) but they do a great job covering doors and other narrow areas.  Overall, when you consider their price and the good points they are a great value.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value Camera
Reviews.Author: K.lav
Reviews.Content: After purchasing a $200 zmodo set with a DVR and four 480tvl cameras, I quickly realized that I wouldneed to upgrade the cameras in order to get the quality that I was looking for. Therefore I started shopping around for different cameras with a higher TVL, my first purchase was a GW 600 TVL CCD camera with an above-average picture but still not quite what I was looking for, the Evertech was my second camera I purchased and I am very impressed so far. The picture quality is much better, the night vision is a touch fuzzy yet still better than any other I own. installation was simple, and of course with Amazon Prime I only had to wait two days to get it which is great. After purchasing this, I decided to try a very similar looking and priced camera however had an 850 TVL in a CMOS image sensor, this Evertech outshines the newer camera in every way. In fact I will be returning the 850 TVL and purchasing a second one of these and will eventually replace them all wish this model its just solid value. Also, I see a lot of reviews about bad night vision on alot of camera models, the reality is simply that good outdoor night vision cannot be expected from a camera with only 24 LEDs, i know this because I have 4 different models/brands and none are really "great". If good night vision is important to you than you'll simply need more LEDs .

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Joseph A Kantola
Reviews.Content: 1-23-2014  -  I have bought 4 of these cameras, which seem to work well with my system.  These things run circles around the zmodo indoor/outdoor all weather bullet cameras that came with my system.  The color and picture is much more vivid.  The night vision works awesome.  I will update this review if I have any problems with this camera.

Reviews.Title: nice picture for the price
Reviews.Author: Lackosleep "Lackosleep"
Reviews.Content: I used this to replace a 5 year old similar Sony CCD that I thought was failing (but turned out to be an faulty PS introducing video noise). I compared the image from this camera to my old one, using a new PS, in both day and night modes. This one has a slightly wider field of view, and a bit more sharpness to the image. I liked this one better and swapped out the older one. The older SONY was $140! This is a good value.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: P Sil
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera in an indoor location for over a month. So far so good. The area I have it in is only measures about 20' x 25' but the night vision works great for this small area which is pitch dark at night.  The daytime images are clear.  The product specifications indicate it has a 90 degree field of vision but id estimate it to be more likely 75-80 degrees.

Reviews.Title: Great cam!
Reviews.Author: Tim@10
Reviews.Content: Great camera especially the OSD function, u can switch off the auto color function & u can see color in low light condition.Daylight picture also great. Thanks Evertech on this one.

Reviews.Title: Lots of artifacts
Reviews.Author: D. Field
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these cameras to replace a couple 480 TVL bullets serving as general over watch. These cameras generate a s*** ton of artifacts and there is no way in hell that these are 700 TVL. Out of the 12 cameras in my home surveillance system, these two are easily the poorest quality I have purchased and as of right now are sitting back in the boxes they were delivered in. I'll probably end up donating them or something, but they are not usable for any realistic surveillance application.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I have an analog system setup at my house, with various camera upgrades that I've made over the years.  I think this camera is probably my favorite, despite a lack of any kind of OSD, and its fixed lens.  It's well built, has very good image quality, and has a small footprint.  There's not much else to ask for. I can't say for sure but I strongly suspect that this a rebranded Dahua camera based on its design and specs.The image quality is incredible when hooked up directly to my monitor.  I can't comment if it's truly 700 TVL but it absolutely transmits video at a higher quality than my DVR supports.  Something to keep in mind is that his camera has a 3.6mm lens, which is a wide angle, so the further away you get from the camera, the fuzzier the image.  The lens is fixed, so there really isn't anything you can do about this.  If you get a non wide angle lens camera, you'll bet a cleaner image but the downside is that it can be like looking through a paper towel role when it comes to the field of view.In terms of video quality, it will be hard to find anything better in an analog system.  What you'll pay for is the on screen programming (very useful if it's kept in a shadow and is directed towards sunlight) and adjustable focus.  If you're looking for your first camera, do yourself a favor and run cat5 with baluns, in case you want to go digital in the future.Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase.  It's exposed to the elements, so I don't know how long it will last.  If I have any issues, I'll update this post.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Rman
Reviews.Content: I made the mistake of trying something different (HQ-Cam Security Dome camera - 700TV Lines 960H DSP Ir Cut Filter High Resolustion Day Night Vision CCTV Infrared Home Security Camera 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens Built-in Ip66 Weatherproof Day Night CCTV Home Video Security Camera)..don't stay with the Evertech good product.

Reviews.Title: Camera is OK Installation is Awful
Reviews.Author: Jack C.
Reviews.Content: Received two of these as a gift.  The cameras work OK and give a wider range of vision but, so do a lot of other cameras.  The design of these cameras is the worst I've ever experienced!!!  The collar that hold the camera to the mount has a very fine thread that is just about impossible to not cross thread, then add powder coat paint and you'll be there for an hour trying to thread it.  I'd give it less than one star if I could.  The designer must have never actually tried to mount of these cameras.  Just no excuse for such a bad design.

Reviews.Title: Made well, and work well. Good Value.
Reviews.Author: IllinoisWisconsinVending
Reviews.Content: Made well, and work well. Good Value. Make sure you don't bend the ring out of shape. And they're made in USA!

Reviews.Title: Really good camera
Reviews.Author: NW
Reviews.Content: I have tried 4 different types of security cameras since I started running a security system at my home.  This camera is by far the best and I love the crispness and clarity of the picture.  Only problem is the company must know this and the price has gone up quite a bit since i purchased my first one.  Had to switch to a lower cost option.  Don't regret the lower cost camera at all, since it was about 1/3 the cost, but the quality definitely isn't as good as the evertech.

Reviews.Title: Good day and night vandal proof camera.
Reviews.Author: M. Lee "meel"
Reviews.Content: All 3 of these cameras I bought work flawlessly.  These are noticeably better than the "700 TV line" Zmodo cameras that came with my security camera system.  This Evertech camera's color day light mode stays on longer after sunset and kicks in earlier in the morning. The camera angle is wider (about 90 degrees).  The night viewing mode is decent and able to see people (not faces) out to about 30 feet. The housing is metal and round, so it should be able to take more abuse.Be realistic and don't expect HD quality from this $43 camera.  The spec says 508 vertical lines. This means you can't read a license plate or clearly identify faces unless it is within 10 feet of the camera.  You will see people, pets, and cars but not in great detail when they are beyond 15 feet from the camera.  Night vision mode provides even less detail.My first camera has been operating for 4 months without any problems, so I bought more.My zmodo dvr records up to D1 resolution, which is 720Hx576V in PAL mode at best, so a better camera is just not justified.  Check the maximum resolution capability of your dvr before buying a better camera.  If you want better resolution spend more on IP cameras.Balancing price and function/construction, I don't think you can get a better deal.  So, 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Excellant
Reviews.Author: Kalpesh Patel
Reviews.Content: Great cameras.. Only problem is that no cables are included.. So add an extra $10-15 to cost if you need to purchse seperatlet

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: S. Turner
Reviews.Content: I use on front porch to cover door and walkway. Picture quality is ok for the price. I have other 700tvl cams and they are better but this looks better than the bullet cams for next to the door. It does cover a wide angle but brightness had to be played with to get an acceptable picture. Has been up for about a month so not sure about durability but so far I am happy.

Reviews.Title: Much better then the bullet cameras that came with my system
Reviews.Author: C. Trent "Bobjr94"
Reviews.Content: The bullet cameras that came with my nightowl system were ok, but narrow angle and the colors were not great.This camera has much better color saturation (the grass now shows up green, before it looked like moss or snow), it shows colors in lower light before switching to b&w; inferred and being wide angle it covers more area. The bullet camera only showed our porch, the camera shows porch and parking area. In low light, this camera is not quite as good as my old ones but this one covers a wider area to the ir is more diffused. Also there is a red glow from the camera at night, but not as noticeable as the original camera was.The bullet camera work well for long narrow areas, like hallways or driveways. This one work good for close up areas that need more coverage.

Reviews.Title: Like It
Reviews.Author: jonnii
Reviews.Content: Even though the picture quality not as sharp as the HiDef one, it provides a fair picture quality. Night vision is great and I can see cat and dog in the dark. Daytime it is great. I like the anti-theft mount. I would recommend to other.

Reviews.Title: Happy With Them.
Reviews.Author: Dan E Worth
Reviews.Content: Very happy with them, they are good camera's for this price range. You can't beat these camera's for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Eddie Duke
Reviews.Content: Clear picture, better close up.  Recorded picture a little grainy at night, but this might be because of my Swann recording device.  All in all, good camera.

Reviews.Title: IT is OK
Reviews.Author: Darry T. Hayashi "DTin FL"
Reviews.Content: I first bought another 700 line vandalism proof out door dome camera, I liked them so much I wanted more but they were no longer available at the great low price I got them at so I settled for this camera. It is not as the dome ones I got. I feel the picture quality is a bit off especially at night. The dome camera had a button on the cable to make some adjustments, this one does not.

Reviews.Title: Wide angel really good
Reviews.Author: brar
Reviews.Content: Wide angel is very good but only thing I don't like hard to adjust after mount color of camera ls very good

Reviews.Title: Worth the money.
Reviews.Author: John Ector
Reviews.Content: Great day/night camera. This camera Much better quality and clarity than the cameras that came with my system.  I'm able to view a further distance also.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Have been using 3 of these outside under an eve for 6 weeks. Very clear wide angle view. Even surprised by the clarity of night-time use.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: thomas spears
Reviews.Content: I choose this because of the 700 tv line and the price the only thing I wish I would have done is read the ir because of the night vision not going very far but it is a sweet little camera she looks great during the day

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: D. S. Johnston ""The Bargain Hunter""
Reviews.Content: Much better picture than the standard Zmodo cameras I received with my surveillance package.  Better image quality and much better color too.  Great product at this price point!  Recommended!!!!!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: mikey
Reviews.Content: works greatthe pic is awesome.it shows the color better.it is a wide lens so its not made to see far awayworks great at night you can see and make out

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Grandpa45
Reviews.Content: I mounted this one in my garage to monitor car a people traffic in and out of the garage and house.  It works well for the price and is just as good as the cameras that came with my Swann DVR system.  It does have a little wider angle so you can see a little more in the picture.  Your not going to read the VIN number off the dash of the car parked in the garage, but you can easily see enough to identify people's faces.

Reviews.Title: Recommend!
Reviews.Author: Robert Haas, Jr.robh693
Reviews.Content: Huge improvement over the OEM cameras that I got with my Zmodo system.  Night vision makes even the darkest room look like Yankee Stadium and the picture quality is much clearer.  I will be replacing all my cameras with this one.  Recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: jason chan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to replace a non-ir camera at our workplace. It was a easy plug and play swap and I couldn't have asked for anything more. The night vision image comes out very nice, it looks like a daytime picture, only in black and white. I will update if I do run into any problems in the near future. But for these past three days, everything has been great and I do plan on purchasing more to place other cameras in our building.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product.  It has a high Television Lines of Resolution.  It has good night vision.  This is a great product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Fine colors and clear
Reviews.Author: Manuel J.
Reviews.Content: Great picture! good material made. i will recommended to any costumer to purchase this type camera from this site any time.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: HDY
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this camera as it shows a good angle and good quality vision.Thanks for providing a great service.Steve

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: CNGW
Reviews.Content: Good value cam that does what it says - clear pics, weather-proof, very easy installation (no special key required)Definately an improvement from the 480TVL I was using before.IRs quite bright / intense - could be pointed outwards a bit more (instead of concentrated towards centre) to cover 90 degree camera coverage but this is often so in other dome cams.No hesitation in recommending!

Reviews.Title: stoped working
Reviews.Author: don mew
Reviews.Content: this stopped working after a few months of getting it i was bummed so i have to get something else

Reviews.Title: GR-8 camera, fantastic picture
Reviews.Author: Oldgizman
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to upgrade and add to my Swann DVR system and the picture is by far the best of all 8 cams installed on my system. Right out of the box it was perfect and I did not need to go into the DVR's control panel to adjust the color, contrast, hue or brightness. So far so good, am very pleased and plan to buy another (price went up $5 after New Years day...."shucks")but still worth the price. Same cam available from other sellers for a bit less but don't want to have to deal with a Chinese vender for support issues.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This item was as described. It was good quality at a fair price. However, I was unable to unscrew the base because it was so tight. The base had to be removed to mount the camera. I had to modify my platform I attached it to because I could not unscrew the base without damaging the unit. Over satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Very good low profile camera
Reviews.Author: William J Corbello
Reviews.Content: I really like the wide angle lens this camera has. I am running it through a Q_See DVR, and it has worked flawlessly. I really try to do my research before buying items like this, and I feel you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Missing item.slow shipping
Reviews.Author: doanhien
Reviews.Content: Missing item.Take a long time to receive. And missing item . The package is not secure the someone stole it on the way they transiting.

Reviews.Title: fffff
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: An elderly couple are in church. The wife leans over and whispers to her husband, "I just let out a long, silent fart. What should I do?" The husband replies, "First off, replace the batteries in your hearing aid!"

ProductInfo.Features:
Effective Pixels: 811(H) x 508(V)
700 TV Lines
ELC AGC AWB - INDOOR + OUTDOOR use
Color high resolation camera
23/24 IR Distance: 45FT (Outdoor)
ProductInfo.Name: Evertech Cctv Security Camera - 700 TVL, Day Night Vision Ir Home Security Camera Vandal Proof Indoor/outdoor 1/3" Sony Super HAD Ccd, 90 Degree Wide View Angle Lens, 23-24 Infrared Led's Surveillance Camera
